value:
Heroes from other worlds, hm? I am
sure we can learn much from them.
I must thank you for summoning me.

I served as Sir Clive's right-hand man
during our time with the Deliverance.
...Time neither of us will soon forget.

Are you resting enough? While it is
true that tenacity is a virtue, fatigue
can spell your end. Do take care.

A castle like this must surely be home
to a tactical codex or two. Would you
mind pointing me toward the library?

Here, my relationship with Sir Clive
may not be defined by our ranks, yet
I would still like to serve him.$k$pHow to best do so, I wonder...

Your sworn ally wishes to express
support. I come bearing good tidings
from $Nf.

Hah! I look rather dashing today,
do I not?

Tolerable results, I suppose. Ah well.
Even small steps are forward motion.

Forgive me for this failure. I will
push myself harder to live up to
your expectations...

I swear to become a Hero worthy
of your support!

Seems it is my turn to make my
entrance. I'm Forsyth! Now then...
which direction to the enemy?

Hello there. How are you doing?
I, for one, couldn't be better. In fact,
I'd like to be deployed even more!$k$pI enlisted with dreams of knighthood,
but I got stuck out in the middle of
nowhere somehow...$k$pBut now I'm glad for any chance to
make a name for myself!$k$pHonestly, I thought I was dreaming,
being summoned to another world
by someone in need of my power...$k$pI just hope I'm able to meet your
expectations... I must be ever ready
to lend my renowned strength... Hah!$k$pEr... Forgive my levity. In any case, for
peace, I shall spare no effort! Please,
give me whatever orders you will!
たあっ
そこだ！
ぐあっ…
これしき…！
Your doom comes!
Run not, coward!
Meet your end!
In the name of Zofia!
The shame of it...
Haha!
I am Forsyth, Sir Clive's lieutenant and advisor. Pleased to meet you.
Whoa! ...Oh, it's you. *ahem* Need something?
We fight to shield Zofia from Rigel's machinations.
It is all thanks to Sir Clive that I'm the man I have become. I owe him my deepest thanks.
I wish Python would take this seriously! *tch* I shouldn't speak ill of him. He's good at heart.
I must think of this as a stop on my journey to becoming a knight. All right! I'm ready to take on the world!
No matter the realm, the task laid on us is the same: preserve the peace.
There you go.
Sure, are you?
Aye!
